beer.beer_description: New name, same great beer! Formerly known as Park Ale, Big Sky Hazy Pale was inspired by sun-drenched good times outdoors. It has a gentle haze, big tropical fruit and citrus flavours, balanced bitterness and a refreshing finish.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 65 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 14!
